select t.*, a.mobile, a.email, c.* from td_cust_info t left join td_login_user_info a on t.cust_id = a.cust_id and t.MERCHANT_FLAG='2' left join bms_protocol_content b on t.cust_id = b.cust_id and b.`status`=#{auditState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN (select T.protocol_id, MAX(CASE T.column_code WHEN 'bankCardNo' THEN T.column_value END) 'bankCardNo', MAX(CASE T.column_code WHEN 'bankCardName' THEN T.column_value END) 'bankCardName', MAX(CASE T.column_code WHEN 'bankName' THEN T.column_value END) 'bankName' from bms_protocol_column T GROUP BY T.protocol_id) c ON b.id = c.protocol_id
WHERE t.CUST_ID = #{custId}
select * from td_merchant_cashier_ref INNER JOIN td_cust_info on MERCHANT_CUST_ID = cust_id where MERCHANT_CUST_ID=#{custId}

SELECT c.*
FROM td_cust_info t
JOIN bms_protocol_content b ON t.CUST_ID = b.cust_id
AND b.`status` = 'AUDIT' JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN t.column_code = 'custManager' then (SELECT s.user_name from sys_user s where s.user_id = t.column_value ) ELSE IFNULL(a.CUST_NAME, t.column_value) end column_value, t.column_code, t.column_desc, t.id, t.STATUS, t.protocol_id FROM bms_protocol_column t LEFT JOIN td_cust_info a ON t.column_value = a.CUST_ID ) c ON c.protocol_id = b.id AND c. STATUS = 'VALID' WHERE
t.CUST_ID =#{custId} ORDER BY column_code LIKE '%.pay_rate%' DESC
